Too many things

27 Apr 2018

I wonder if I think about too many things, have too many different pastimes, try to push myself in too many different areas. According to a youtube video I watched today, it is one of the seven signs of someone with high functioning depression, and as well know youtube videos > academic journals and papers. Oh well, only thing I am interested in tomorrow is the gym.
